channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- User Submitted Posts
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- User Submitted Posts

item.title: CVE-2024-5002|2024-08-01T20:55:10.411Z -- unknown -- user%20submitted%20posts
item.description: The User Submitted Posts WordPress plugin before 20240516 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-5002|2024-07-13T06:00:07.139Z -- unknown -- user%20submitted%20posts
